definitions.definition: A recidivist ; one who backslides , especially in a religious sense; an apostate .
examples: She married him thinking to change his ways, and for a while he got religion, but he was ever a backslider ; she soon began finding bottles stashed about the house.

definitions.definition: One who will not do his work or shoulder his responsiblities.

main_definition: A recidivist ; one who backslides , especially in a religious sense; an apostate .
secondary_definitions: ( Ireland ) One who will not do his work or shoulder his responsiblities.
